name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
review: A gripping mystery thriller with complex characters and unexpected twists.

name: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
review: A captivating adventure uncovering secrets of the past, filled with suspense and intrigue.

name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
review: An enchanting tale of magic, friendship, and adventure that captivates readers of all ages.

name: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
review: A poignant story of friendship, betrayal, and redemption set against the backdrop of Afghanistan.

name: The Help
author: Kathryn Stockett
review: A compelling novel exploring racial tensions and the lives of African American maids in 1960s Mississippi.

name: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
review: A thrilling dystopian novel featuring a young heroine's struggle for survival in a brutal televised competition.
